First thing, To play and burn games you have to have a flashed Xbox360, your ISO, ABGX360, and X360 ISO Hacker (for MAC), A Dual Layer R-DVD, and a Dual Layer burner. Look it up on YouTube.

Secondly, I have burnt many games and I know what I am doing. This is a bad rip.

LISTEN ALL YOU FUCKING DUMB COCKSUCKING N00BS!!!!   this version works FINE!!!!!!! you hear me  FINE!!!!! the reason it wont stealth patch is because the retail version isnt out until friday you helm-sucking twats!!!! UNPACK USING WINRAR!

then:

1) make sure your xbox is flashed with the latest iextreme lt+ firmware
2) download a program called abgx
3) while in abgx go to the autofix tab, set to level 3
4)open the disc image file of whatever game you have downloaded in abgx
5) wait for the game to be stealth patched etc and wait till it has finished. you will be prompted to press any key to exit.
6)go back to the folder containing the games files and now click the and open the image file.
7)it should automatically open in the program imgburn (im assuming you have this? if not then download imgburn!)
8)put a blank dldvd in you drive hopefully a verbatim disc.
9) hit the burn button and wait for the game to burn........hey presto! a fully functioning new game.
10) MOST IMPORTANTLY! after all steps are complete, raise you middle finger high in the air and shout FUCK YOU MICROSOFT!!!!!!

@SoruBaddogai

yea they will not work cause the new update will update the dashboard ,

and when updated the dahboard will activate a AP2.5 schem that in certain games

that will not allow them to work again

and the games that have ap2.5 are 6 games :

COD black ops and modern warfare 2 ,halo reach ,fable 3 ,assassin Creed brothehood,
need for speed hot pursuit .

so the solution is 

to take the iso of the blak ops like example and re patch it through abgx360 ,follow this toturial

http://www.ixtreme.net/360-backups/abgx-tutorial-t5056.html

and u need the last ixtrem LT +1.1 to play AP2.5
IF u have a benq or lite-on drive .


BUT! if u have a original samsung or old hitachi drive u will not need any of these things above

cause these 2 drives are not able to check for AP2.5, and its safe to update dashboard .

so is better to know whats u drive type first and make sure if its original drive of the xbox not a spoofed one  ; )

Ok got it working and here is a step-by-step guide for those of you who can't get it working.

1) Download THIS torrent. The other one is a fake.
2) Extract using WinRar.
3) Use Abgx to ensure the torrent worked without any corruption. Here is a Guide or you can use the other one that was linked earlier (which is probably better):

http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/732074

4) Abgx should say everything is good. Next there are a few options:

A) Ensure your Xbox360 is flashed with the latest firmware and it should work. Burn the ISO and play.

B) Use Waves Patcher to convert the game to a lower Wave. It is currently Wave 11. I converted it to Wave 3. Use ImgBurn like you would for any other game and burn the PATCHED ISO.

6) Profit
